```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r load data}
## Set directory
setwd('.')
directory = "data/hallmarks_genesets.rds"
giv_gene_sets <- readRDS(directory)

directory = "data/add_data_sets.rds"
add_gene_sets <- readRDS(directory)
```

```{r combine the two lists}
total_gene_sets <- append(giv_gene_sets[["genesets"]], add_gene_sets)
total_gene_sets_ordered <- total_gene_sets[order(names(total_gene_sets))]
```

```{r export}
saveRDS(total_gene_sets, file = "pathways.rds")
```
